title: PolitiFact - No, liberals are not trying to make pedophilia legal in the US
subtitle: Liberals (or conservatives or anyone else) are not trying to make pedophilia legal "in preparation of Sharia law in Amer
author: www.politifact.com
vclaim:
Liberals (or conservatives or anyone else) are not trying to make pedophilia legal "in preparation of Sharia law in America," despite what one story claims.

The article, which displays an image of a man in a turban kissing a young boy, was published by a website called "Now The End Begins" in 2015 and updated in 2019. It was wrong then. It’s wrong now.

The story was flagged as part of Facebook’s efforts to combat false news and misinformation on its News Feed. (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.)

There is no context to the image and we could not track down the original. Nevertheless, the story’s message is wrong.

The article’s content seems to suggest that the Democratic Party’s support of the gay community, Muslims, and the successful bids of Democratic Muslim congresswomen Rashida Tlaib and Ihan Omar is reason enought to claim that the party is aiming to make pedophilia legal.

There is no evidence that any U.S. politician, liberal or otherwise, is trying to make pedophilia legal or that they are pushing any sort of religious views or laws.

The claim is inaccurate and ridiculous. Pants on Fire!
